channel.title: CVE Feed for Select-Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Select-Themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-34553|2024-08-02T02:59:20.977Z -- select-themes -- stockholm%20core
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Select-Themes Stockholm Core allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Stockholm Core: from n/a through 2.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-34552|2024-08-02T02:59:20.992Z -- select-themes -- stockholm
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Select-Themes Stockholm allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Stockholm: from n/a through 9.6.
